trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around November 25th 2012
divs: sighting detailsvery cloudy, night. there are a few "breaks" in the clouds, which reveals a very dark, clear sky. one of these "breaks" in the clouds revealed a stationary object (appearing diamond-shaped) which flashed brilliant colors: white\red\blue\green. to the left of this object (more to the east) 3 circular lights slowly began appearing in a perfectly straight line. all three lights were equidistant to each other, and they slowly "came into view". when the 3 lights "lighted up" where you could clearly see that they were most probably attached to "something"- although nothing was visible! the diamond-shaped object, still glimmering different colors very brightly, appeared to be "staying in the same place"- while the 3 other lights were becoming brighter......then dimmer............then brighter...........then poof!!!!!!!!! all 4 lights vanished. gone. very strange. i tried to take a picture...but no camera that would take that picture after dark. i felt very curious and amazed to see this, as i did not expect it! i lost sight of the object when, just exactly as though somebody had "flipped a switch" and shut them all off at the same time- they were gone.
Summary: extremely bright, diamond-shaped "star-like" object flashing brilliant colors
